article.description: Nick Jacobson hit seven 3-pointers and had 24 points to help Utah hold off San Diego State 75-69 in the quarterfinals of the Mountain West Conference tournament Thursday.
article.headline: Third shot at BYU in the offing?
article.linkText: Utah edges past game SDSU; NCAA hopes alive
article.story: SAN DIEGO (AP) -- Marcus Slaughter had 25 points, 10 rebounds and five steals on Thursday to lead San Diego State to an 87-67 exhibition victory over Point Loma Nazarene. Slaughter scored 14 points in the first 3:04 against the NAIA Sea Lions as as the Aztecs built a 51-31 halftime lead. Slaughter was 9-of-15 including 3-of-4 from 3-point range. Chris Walton added 15 points on 6-of-7 shooting, including three 3-point baskets, while Matt Thomas added 14 points for San Diego State. Tim Kruge had 15 points and 10 rebounds to lead Point Loma.
